titles.title: A bill to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to authorize the Operation Stonegarden grant program, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to authorize the Operation Stonegarden grant program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
